item.title: flairR: An R Wrapper for Accessing Flair NLP Tagging Features
item.author: Author
item.description: FlaiR - R wrapper for Flair NLP We are testing our package, an R wrapper specifically designed for Flair NLP. This package offers core sequence tagging features such as part-of-speech tasks, named entity recognition, and transformer-based sentiment analysis. For researchers in social or political science, it directly returns a dataframe instead of objects. If you are more comfortable with function-oriented features, this R wrapper might be beneficial for you, as it provides a more direct approach.
